name: jsonresume-theme-minimal-classy
description: Minimal Classy Theme for JSON Resume
author: agsoto

scripts.serve: npm run build && resumed render resume.json --theme jsonresume-theme-minimal-classy --output resume.html && node scripts/serve.js
scripts.build:pdf: npm run build && resumed export --theme jsonresume-theme-minimal-classy
scripts.build:html: npm run build && resumed render --theme jsonresume-theme-minimal-classy
scripts.test:build:pdf: npm run build && resumed export ./test/fixture.resume.json --theme jsonresume-theme-minimal-classy -o resume.pdf
scripts.test:build:html: npm run build && resumed render ./test/fixture.resume.json --theme jsonresume-theme-minimal-classy -o resume.html
